about_the_game:
The untouched shores of Saturn's moon Titan yearn for exploitation.

Today, we land on Titan. We can strip mine its precious minerals, manufacture valuable goods to ship off-world, or even sell them to the colonists who are sure to arrive soon after you. And how better to survive Titan's brutal climate than with a sprawling factory to produce everything we need?

And those so-called settlers who claim they were there first? Nonsense. We will be the first, and any who say otherwise are merely pirates and scavengers, soon to fall under the tanks and jets and space warships we manufacture. Will you lead your corporation to claim all of Titan?

Build a factory in seconds, or spend hours designing and optimizing for the perfect layout. Lay down a web of smart maglevs for your logistics. Or use a fleet of cargo trucks, or aircraft instead.

First you must produce enough air, food, and water for your workers to survive. Then, you must face a Crisis Engine which throws at you everything from devastating natural disasters to unrelenting pirate assaults!

What's the point of building a factory without turning a profit? Trade raw resources with settlers or build cities for governments for money. Or sell weapons to rebels or nukes to terrorists to fund your factory!

War and Peace

The more money you make, the more you will attract the attention of Pirates and Scavengers eager to steal your hard earned resources. Set up missile turrets to destroy them as they sneak into your factory, or perhaps simply pay them to look the other way. As you grow even larger, war between other factions may start to spill into your factory too!

Infinite Procedural World

Generate an infinite, procedural worlds in a single click, and explore it endlessly. Each time you play, the world is completely unique. Like the pirates who drive past your gun turrets, they never get old!

7 Unique Factions

Choose from 7 different factions, each with a different playstyle. Try a vehicle-focused faction that starts with cargo speeders to race your goods around. Or perhaps a maglev-heavy faction, with a focus on limitless spaghetti. Or try a faction that starts with rockets from the get go, that can deliver resources to and from space at ease!

Climate Dynamics

Titan's unique atmosphere produces complex wind and weather patterns. As you smelt raw ores, your waste heat and pollution will also heavily affect the climate and wind. A clever engineer can even exploit these heating patterns to generate power from the resulting wind and pollution.

Smart Logistics

No more mindless conveyor belts that get backed up and cause mistakes. Your Maglev Tubes know where to send goods and exactly what quantity is requested, sort across junctions automatically, and handle loops smartly.

Faction Relations

Trade, negotiate, or go to war with over a dozen Allied, Neutral, and Enemy factions also settled on Titan.

Varying Difficulty Levels

Play a casual, relaxing game in a sandbox mode without enemies or challenges, or test your mettle with a brutal, unforgiving gameplay. You can also fully customize all difficulty settings!

Mod Support

Use community-made Build Templates from Steam Workshop, or upload your own. You can also easily make and upload mods directly to Steam Workshop for others to try!
